title: (x) "Erica" unicase casual script - MVB Emmascript {Yves}
content:
Can anyone id [this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202022359/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v11/jennarose/livejournal/beingerica_header.gif)? I would like the font for Erica ID'ed, not Being.

Thank you!
author: BepperGirl

comments.content:
There are not enough letters to see any repeats, which makes it hard to prove this is a font. It reminds me of some of Ronna Penner's stuff at Typadelic, but a quick look at her collection at MyFonts did not find a match.

- Mike Yanega
